title: When is the new Championship Zed leaving the store
body: I won't be able to get it until christmas and I was wondering if the new Championship Zed skin will leave the store by then.

replies.body: have you gotten any more information? this is the only thread of information i can find even mentioning the when its leaving and it doesnt have a specific day or evn month. any information would be nice as i to (although not as late) will only be able to purchase later, but if its only out for a week im going to miss it

I don't have any information on unreleased content, but any updates will be provided at our [Sales ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales)page.  If you do happen to confront a situation like this, you can always reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'd be happy to help!
